item.title: Simple 60/40 portfolio would’ve easily beaten hedge-fund returns last year
item.description: A simple 60/40 model would’ve easily beat the returns that hedge-fund investors enjoyed, according to an estimate of their performance.

item.title: How to ‘Trump-proof’ your 401(k)
item.description: An investment idea for the terrified.

item.title: Capital One cheated customers out of $2 billion by keeping deposits in lower-yield accounts, CFPB says
item.description: The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau is suing Capital One, which it says kept customers in the dark about higher-yielding savings accounts.

item.title: What’s the best way to convince 20-year-olds to save for retirement?
item.description: A parent wants to persuade reluctant young adults to start investing.

item.title: TikTok is the last thing Elon Musk needs right now
item.description: The Tesla CEO should be focused on his EV business at a time when the automotive landscape is rapidly evolving. Investors also don’t need another dist...
